original_text: These people have turned against the Lord. They are his children but they love to tell lies. They do not want to obey his law. These people have turned against the Lord. They are his children but they love to tell lies. They do not want to obey his law.
korean_text: 대저 이는 패역한 백성이요 거짓말 하는 자식들이요 여호와의 법을 듣기 싫어하는 자식들이라

sentences.original_text: These people have turned against the Lord
but they love to tell lies
They do not want to obey his law
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 율법을 순종하기를 원치 않습니다
